sentences.en: About World Soccer MagazineWorld Soccer as the undisputed authority on international football.
sentences.cn: 英国的一本体育杂志-世界足球. 主要从事世界足球运动的宣传.

sentences.en: Akiba undisputed power, I think this is a true portrayal of her.
sentences.cn: 秋叶不争功, 我想这就是她真实写照.

sentences.en: As it happens, the planet also has only one undisputed, known male.
sentences.cn: 鉴于她的出现, 那么一定还有一只老公龟.

sentences.en: Doctors found undisputed evidence of nerve damage.
sentences.cn: 医生发现了神经受损的确凿证据。

sentences.en: In return, Italy was given undisputed ownership of Rome.
sentences.cn: 作为交换条件, 意大利则对罗马拥有无可争辩的所有权.

sentences.en: Maeve Binchy , the undisputed queen of romantic fiction , is the favourite author.
sentences.cn: 爱尔兰当代小说家梅芙·奇是言情小说的顶级作家,她无疑是一位受欢迎的小说家.

sentences.en: Our product has become the undisputed market leader.
sentences.cn: 我们的产品成为在市场上无可匹敌的产品.

sentences.en: Seles won 10 tournaments, and was the undisputed world champion.
sentences.cn: 塞莱斯拿到了10个锦标赛冠军，是当之无愧的世界冠军。

sentences.en: The prime example is Macy's, once the undisputed king of California retailers.
sentences.cn: 最典型的例子是梅西百货，它曾经是加利福尼亚无可争辩的零售巨头。

sentences.en: The scene ends with his painful acceptance of an unwelcome but undisputed responsibility.
sentences.cn: 这一场是以他的痛苦地接受一项讨厌但又不可推诿的责任结束的.

sentences.en: The Smoking Skull and Undisputed titles are spot - on though.
sentences.cn: 吸烟颅骨和无可争议的标题是当场就各异.

sentences.en: the undisputed champion of the world
They are the undisputed champions in draughts and Othello.
sentences.cn: 它们是国际跳棋及奥塞罗无可争辩的冠军.

sentences.en: They were the undisputed stars in Sarejeve.
sentences.cn: 他们的表演轰动四座,他们在萨拉热窝了成为无可争议的明星.

trans.tran_cn: 无可置疑的，毫无疑问的，无可争辩的，无异议的
